findings.title: Oracle update cost too low relative to exploitable value
findings.description: TellorFlex allows anyone to submit prices after staking only 10 TRB (~$175). The cost to manipulate the oracle is far less than the value that can be extracted.
findings.impact: Attacker stakes minimal TRB, submits inflated price, borrows against inflated collateral, profits >> stake cost.
findings.recommendation: Require higher stake, implement dispute period, use multiple oracle sources.

findings.title: No price sanity checks on oracle read
findings.description: The borrow function uses oracle price without checking staleness, deviation from TWAP, or comparison to secondary oracles.
findings.recommendation: Add staleness check, deviation bounds, and secondary oracle validation.
